name: The Last Mission (itch)
description:
Play on WebGL

   The Last Mission is a third person shooter. We try to put players in stressful situations. That is, you will have to get rid of all the zombies within 5 minutes and most importantly, if you are attacked by them, you will die immediately!! (Of course, you were bitten by a zombie.) You have to get rid of all the zombies. before you are eliminated yourself
  

    The Story
 In 2899 there was a virus that changed people all over the world. become a zombie We will be playing the role A soldier who has been ordered to defeat the zombies. before it's too late

   Sometimes shooting isn't the answer. We might have to run away from this crazy situation as far as possible before it got there
